description:
The Count escalates his plan for revenge, launching a bitter blow at his next target, the Danglars Bank. The impact will be felt by many - including Albert.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Even If I Should Stop Being Me
Même si je n`étais plus moi-même
Tatoe, Boku ga Boku de Nakunatta Toshitemo
たとえ, 僕が僕でなくなったとしても
